desc:
To be able to capture judgments taken against trusts.
To be able to capture judgments taken against sole proprietorships.

c.	New Defendant Type â€“ Trust
Purpose
1.	To be able to capture judgments taken against trusts.
Motivation
1.	We are currently unable to capture judgments granted against trusts which is limiting our ability to sell these types of information.
Scope
1.	Adding a new option under defendant type called Trust.
2.	The fields would be the same as they currently are for commercial entities.
3.	The only field that would need to change would be the company registration number which must change to Trust Number.
a.	The trust number field is 11 characters in the following format: IT####/yyyy.
b.	The IT prefix can be prepopulated for the capturer.


d.	New Defendant Type â€“ Sole Proprietorship
i.	Purpose
1.	To be able to capture judgments taken against sole proprietorships.
ii.	Motivation
1.	We are currently unable to capture judgments granted against sole proprietorships which is limiting our ability to sell these types of information.
iii.	Scope
1.	Adding a new option under defendant type called Sole Proprietorship.
2.	The fields would be the same as they currently are for commercial entities.
3.	The only field that would need to change would be the company registration number which must change to an ID number.
a.	The ID number field must work the same way it currently works for consumers. i.e. the IDV check.
name: CW - New Defendant Types
